name: Demon's Island
description:
Viewer beware... You're in for a scare...

Welcome to...

DEMON'S ISLAND

Will you survive the horrors within? 

Download and find out...

FEATURES:

Choose between 26 unique characters...

Get a custom particle effect to scream at people....

Find and uncover 26 secret rooms...

Find 11 unique familiars to customize yourself with...

Get upgrades to explore the map further...

Discover the dark secret of the conspiracy room...

And do it all online with your friends...

SPECIAL THANKS TO:

Ian

Bryce Bucher

Cosme

Kerosene

Micah

Tim

Valerie Dusk

Jett

NOTICE: This game may contain some copyrighted content. The game is meant as an explorable art collage, but if you see something that's yours and want something done about it, contact me on Twitter!
